Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.controller.AdminController
@RestController public class AdminController extends Object
REST controller for administrative operations.

Provides endpoints for approving/rejecting instructor applications, blocking users, managing courses, and retrieving user and course information.

See Also:
  • AdminService
  • UserService
  • CourseService

  • Constructor Details

      public AdminController()

  • Method Details

    • approveInstructorApplication

      @PostMapping("/admin/approve-instructor-application") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> approveInstructorApplication(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid RespondToInstructorAppDto dto)
      Approves an instructor application.

      Accepts a RespondToInstructorAppDto containing the instructor application ID, invokes the AdminService.approveInstructorApp(UUID) method, and returns a response indicating successful approval.

      Parameters:
      dto - the request payload containing the instructor application ID
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • rejectInstructorApplication

      @PostMapping("/admin/reject-instructor-application") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> rejectInstructorApplication(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid RespondToInstructorAppDto dto)
      Rejects an instructor application.

      Accepts a RespondToInstructorAppDto containing the instructor application ID and a rejection message, invokes the AdminService.rejectInstructorApp(UUID, String) method, and returns a response indicating successful rejection.

      Parameters:
      dto - the request payload containing the instructor application ID and rejection message
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • blockUser

      @PostMapping("/admin/block-user/{userId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> blockUser(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable String userId)
      Blocks a user by their user ID.

      Extracts the admin's user information from the JWT, invokes the AdminService.blockUser(User, String) method, and returns a response indicating successful blocking.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the admin's authentication details
      userId - the ID of the user to be blocked
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/admin/user/all") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<List<User>>> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users in the system.

      Invokes the UserService.getAll() method and returns a list of all users.

      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a list of all User entities

    • getUser

      @GetMapping("/admin/user/{userId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<User>> getUser(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable String userId)
      Retrieves a specific user by their user ID.

      Extracts the admin's user information from the JWT, invokes the UserService.findByIdAsAdmin(User, String) method, and returns the requested user details.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the admin's authentication details
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing the requested User entity

    • deleteCourseAsAdmin

      @DeleteMapping("/admin/delete-course/{courseId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> deleteCourseAsAdmin(@PathVariable UUID courseId)
      Deletes a course as an admin.

      Invokes the CourseService.deleteCourseAsAdmin(UUID) method to delete the specified course, and returns a response indicating successful deletion.

      Parameters:
      courseId - the ID of the course to be deleted
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • approveCourse

      @PostMapping("/admin/approve-course/{courseId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> approveCourse(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID courseId)
      Approves a course submitted by an instructor.

      Extracts the admin's user information from the JWT, invokes the CourseService.approveCourse(User, UUID) method, and returns a response indicating successful approval.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the admin's authentication details
      courseId - the ID of the course to be approved
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • rejectCourse

      @PostMapping("/admin/reject-course/{courseId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<String>> rejectCourse(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt, @PathVariable UUID courseId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid CourseRejectionDto dto)
      Rejects a course submitted by an instructor.

      Extracts the admin's user information from the JWT, invokes the CourseService.rejectCourse(User, UUID, CourseRejectionDto) method, and returns a response indicating successful rejection.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the admin's authentication details
      courseId - the ID of the course to be rejected
      dto - the request payload containing rejection details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a success message

    • findAllCourses

      @GetMapping("/admin/course/all") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public ApiRes<Res<List<Course>>> findAllCourses(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.jwt.Jwt jwt)
      Retrieves all courses accessible to the admin.

      Extracts the admin's user information from the JWT, invokes the CourseService.findAllCourses(User) method, and returns a list of all courses.

      Parameters:
      jwt - the JWT token containing the admin's authentication details
      Returns:
      an ApiRes containing a list of all Course entities
